body: The cavalier must guard his sworn charge with all he has: his health, his honor, and his very life. If his charge is a place, he must keep intruders out. If it is a thing, he must keep it safe from thieves—and restore the item to its rightful place if taken.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Cavalier/Cavalier Orders/Order of the Seal/Edicts
name: Edicts
